close-stream.cant-close-message: You cannot close a stream from a locked treasury
close-stream.cant-topup-message: You cannot top up a stream from a locked treasury
close-stream.context-beneficiary: Closing a stream will send the vested amount to your account ({{beneficiary}}) and stop the flow of money immediately.
close-stream.context-treasurer-aditional-message: The above amounts are only accurate for paused and ended streams. For live steams, the amounts will be determined the moment the stream is closed.
close-stream.context-treasurer-multiple-beneficiaries: Closing a stream will stop the money flow, send the vested amount to the beneficiary ({{beneficiary}}), and return the unvested amounts back to the original treasury ({{treasury}}).
close-stream.context-treasurer-single-beneficiary: Closing a stream will stop the money flow, send the vested amount to the beneficiary ({{beneficiary}}), and return the unvested amount back to the contributor.

donation-fund.description: Create an account where anyone can donate with the peace of mind that the funds will be used for the right cause.
donation-fund.name: Donation Fund

fundraising.description: Looking to raise funds your Seed, Series, ICOs, DAICOs, Private Rounds? Look no further than a Fundraising Contract.
fundraising.name: Fundraising

otp.description: Send money or schedule a payment to another person just one time. Use this option to pay for anything you like.
otp.name: One-Time Payment

payroll.description: Setup payroll for an employee or contractor, anywhere in the world without the overhead of traditional banking services.
payroll.name: Payroll

pension-fund.description: For employers setting up pension plans that pay employees upon qualifying events, such as reaching retirement age.
pension-fund.name: Pension Fund

real-estate-sale-escrow.description: Setup the escrow account for a Real Estate transaction. Seller and buyer get direct access and full auditing for free.
real-estate-sale-escrow.name: Real Estate Sale (Escrow)

rent-collection.description: Setup rent collection for your tenants. Get paid in real time for every minute they occupy your property.
rent-collection.name: Rent Collection

repeating.description: Send money to anyone at a fixed flow rate over time. Great for family remittances, child allowances and more.
repeating.name: Repeating Payment

setup-everything.description: Recommended for professionals that want to setup a contract with unique terms, not commonly used.
setup-everything.name: Setup everything (Advanced)

subscription.description: Setup a SaaS subscription contract for regular membership payments. Think Netflix, or your monthly Gym Club Membership.
subscription.name: Subscription

first-container.text-one: We provide secure custody solutions for institutions and individuals alike so they can safely invest in crypto assets.
first-container.text-three: Dedicated Support Team that guides you during the onboard process and help you resolve any challenge.
first-container.text-two: With MeanFi Trading, access multiple venues through one onboarding. Borrow crypto or USD against crypto collateral, or lend and earn returns on assets under custody.

custody.heading: Crypto Asset Custody

second-container.text: We're a team of engineers, designers, and crypto experts who believe that the future is digital assets. However, with no way to securely store them right now we feel like our hands are tied behind our back. So we decided to build MeanFi Custody so that you can finally make your money work for you!
second-container.title: WHY MEANFI CUSTODY

custody.subheading: The most advanced digital asset platform, for secure crypto custody, trading, staking, governance, and more.

third-container.text: MeanFi supports assets that meet our standards of quality and safety. Our list includes USDC, USDT, SOL, DAI, and more. We are always looking to grow our portfolio with new Assets. To learn more about our roadmap, please get in touch.
third-container.title: Supported Assets

repeating-twice-month.description: Every other week on {{dayOfWeek}}, starting today.
repeating-twice-month.name: Every two weeks

ddca-setup-modal.headline: Buy {{fromTokenAmount}} worth of {{toTokenSymbol}} {{recurrencePeriod}} for {{totalPeriod}}, starting today.

help.help-item-01: You'll deposit {{fromTokenAmount}} into your personal vault.
help.help-item-01-topup: Deposit an additional {{fromTokenAmount}} into your personal vault.
help.help-item-02: The vault uses the deposit to make the exchanges {{recurrencePeriod}}.
help.help-item-03: When you are ready, get your fresh {{toTokenSymbol}} from the vault.

notes.note-item-01: Only you can withdraw funds from your vault
notes.note-item-02: Fees for the scheduled swaps are charged upfront
notes.note-item-03: All unused fees are returned to you upon withdrawal

ddcas.setup-close-warning: Closing without clicking. Start will skip your first purchase. Close anyways?

deposits.address-share-disclaimer: This address can only be used to receive SOL and SPL tokens on Solana.
deposits.heading: Deposit from your Card, Bank Account, or from another Blockchain directly into your Solana Wallet.
deposits.renbridge-cta-warning: Chase Bank (US) credit card and debit cards will not work to buy crypto. All other banks are OK!

error-screens.service-unavailable-message: It appears there's congestion on the network at the moment. Please wait a few minutes and try again.

faucet.funding-amount: Your account will be funded with
faucet.not-connected: Your wallet is not connected, please connect your wallet

general.not-connected: Your wallet is not connected, please connect your wallet

panel-left.not-connected: Please connect your wallet to see your invest options

panel-right.first-text: MEAN staking rewards include emission incentives plus a share of the protocol revenues. When you stake your MEAN, you get sMEAN (staked MEAN) in return.

liquidity-pool.text-one: MEAN Liquidity Pools are currently available on Orca and Raydium with multiple pools including MEAN/SOL, MEAN/RAY and MEAN/USDC.
liquidity-pool.text-three: Before you add funds to a pool, be sure to read and accept the risks associated with investing in a liquidity pool.
liquidity-pool.text-two: To invest in a liquidity pool, you need to supply both tokens that make up the pool. For example, when you join the Raydium MEAN/USDC pool both MEAN and USDC tokens are required. For more details, see the adding liquidity guides on
liquidity-pool.title: MEAN Liquidity Pools

panel-right.second-text: Simply holding your sMEAN is all that is required to continuously grow your MEAN stash. You don't need to harvest the rewards with MEAN staking. When you unstake your sMEAN, you will receive the rewards earned in the form of additional MEAN on top of the amount staked.

staking-data.text-two: Locking boost periods are coming soon to earn even more MEAN!
staking-data.title: Your Current Stake:

staking-sol.text-one: Liquid SOL staking is currently available with three providers on Solana. These are Lido (stSOL), Marinade (mSOL) and Socean (scnSOL).
staking-sol.text-two: Before you stake your SOL, be sure to read and accept the risks associated when staking with one of these providers.
staking-sol.title: Liquid SOL Staking

stats.staking-apy-tooltip: The APR associated with sMEAN is a representation of the price of sMEAN over a 365 day period.

stake.name: Stake
stake.notification-label: Staking period of {{periodValue}} {{periodTime}} will lock your Tokens until {{unstakeStartDate}}.
stake.period-label: How long do you want to stake for?
stake.terms-and-conditions-tooltip: Your tokens will be locked for the period of time selected and you will not be able to unstake them before the staking period ends. When you stake additional tokens to an existing contract, the staking period will be extended to the new end date for ALL of the tokens locked.
stake.verified-label: I agree to the Terms & Conditions

unstake.name: Unstake
unstake.notification-label-one: Your currently have {{stakedAmount}} sMEAN staked which is currently locked until {{unstakeStartDate}}
unstake.notification-label-one-error: You currently don't have any sMEAN.
unstake.notification-label-two: Unstaking will withdraw the specified amount of unlocked sMEAN tokens to your wallet
unstake.verified-label: I agree to the Terms & Conditions
unstake.success-transaction-message: {{sMeanValue}} sMEAN has been successfully unstaked and you have received {{meanValue}} MEAN in return.

panel-right.title: Stake MEAN to Earn MEAN Rewards

market.token-circulating-suppply: The amount of coins that are circulating in the market and are in public hands. It is analogous to the flowing shares in the stock market
market.token-fully_dilluted_market_cap: The total market value of a cryptocurrency's circulating supply. It is analogous to the free-float capitalization in the stock market. Market Cap = Current Price x Circulating Supply
market.token-holders: Enthusiasts denoting a long-term approach to cryptocurrency investing
market.token-total-money-streams: Total number of continuous payments over time that have been created by the Money Streaming Program
market.token-total-supply: The amount of coins that have been already created, minus any coins that have been burned. It is analogous to the outstanding shares in the stock market
market.token-total-value-locked: The number of assets that are currently being staked in a specific protocol
market.token-total-volume: A measure of how much of a cryptocurrency was traded in the last 24 hours

treasury-type-options.treasury-type-locked-description: With a locked treasury you can create streams that act like a vesting contract for reserved allocations, like the ones needed for investors. They usually have a fixed end date.
treasury-type-options.treasury-type-open-description: With an open treasury, you can create money streams that run indefinitely. When the treasury runs out of money all streams stop, until it gets replenished.

Please provide a csv text file with one address per line in the following format: 
 MEMO or STREAM NAME, WALLET ADDRESS. 

 Here is an example of how it should look: 
 Epoch 1, FrdFf3EqcGuytTweLvoELBt29WrAGVYjrh4585A2bTAZ 

 Before you submit the file, please make sure the recipient addresses are correct and do not belong to an exchange.
